title: SLO Calculator
description: Unified SLO calculator and error budget tracker. See what SLO you can achieve, check if you can meet a target, and visualize your budget burndown—all in one place.

title: Status Page Update Generator
description: Free tool to generate professional incident status updates. Create clear, consistent messages for investigating, identified, monitoring, and resolved phases—compatible with Statuspage, PagerDuty, and any status page provider.

title: On-Call Coverage Models
description: Compare on-call rotation schedules: follow-the-sun, weekly rotation, 12-hour shifts, and more. Visualize coverage gaps, engineer burden, and find the right schedule for your team size.

title: Kanban Board
description: Interactive task board with drag-and-drop. Create, organize, and share your boards via URL.

title: Site Analytics Dashboard
description: Unified view of site performance: GA4 traffic, Search Console rankings, Lighthouse audits, and Real User Monitoring. Data pipelines via GitHub Actions.

title: Change Log Explorer
description: Browse the history of completed work on this site. Expandable cards with PR links, plan files, checklists, and timeline of each item's journey.

title: CLI Tool Playground
description: Interactive in-browser demos for common CLI tools. Experiment with jq, grep, sed, and awk using sample data and presets.

title: Incident Command Diagrams
description: Reusable incident response flowcharts for escalation, management, and paging paths. Copy the Mermaid source and adapt to your team.
